key_0.set1: Hell In A Bucket-> Sugaree, Minglewood Blues, Friend Of The Devil, Mama Tried-> Big River, Loser
key_0.set2: Iko Iko, Looks Like Rain, Gimme Some Lovin'-> Jam*-> Drums-> Jam-> The Other One-> Wharf Rat-> One More Saturday Night-> Good Lovin'-> One More Saturday Night, E: Black Muddy River

key_1.name: Grateful Dead
key_1.set1: Touch Of Grey, Feel Like A Stranger, Franklin's Tower, Walkin' Blues, When Push Comes To Shove, Cassidy
key_1.set2: China Cat Sunflower-> I Know You Rider, Samson & Delilah, Terrapin Station, Drums-> Jam-> I Need A Miracle-> Stella Blue, Throwing Stones, Turn On Your Love Light, E: The Mighty Quinn
key_1.comment: Mardi Gras Parade During Iko. w/ Batucaje percussion begins second setDr. John Opened* featuring Chinese dragon parade Chinese Symphony Orchestra Opened *W/ Hamza El Din *W/ Hamza El Din

key_2.set1: Jack Straw-> West L.A. Fadeaway, Me & My Uncle-> Mexicali Blues, Row Jimmy, When I Paint My Masterpiece, Bird Song

key_3.name: Grateful Dead
key_3.set1: Hey Pocky Way; Desolation Row; Tennessee Jed; Little Red Rooster; Cumberland Blues; It's All Over Now; Box Of Rain> Don't Ease Me In
key_3.set2: Bertha> Man Smart, Woman Smarter; Ship of Fools; Estimated Prophet> Drums> Space> Truckin'> Black Peter> Sugar Magnolia; E: Brokedown Palace
key_3.comment: 'We want Phil' before Box; Dragon dance during Drums

key_4.name: Grateful Dead
key_4.comment:
The 11th annual Bay Area Music Awards show, The Bammies.
The finale jam that featured the entire Grateful Dead, along with Huey Lewis and the News; Phil Lesh and Mario Cipollina on bass, Bob Weir (in tuxedo), Jerry Garcia (wearing a brown sport coat over his traditional black tee) and Chris Hayes on guitars, Billy Kreutzmann, Mickey Hart and Billy Gibson on drums, Johnny Colla on sax, Brent Mydland and Merl Saunders (who were seated at the same organ), and Sean Hopper on keyboards.

key_30.venue: The Inn by the Sea Tape
key_30.set1: Instrumental Victim Or The Crime Blow Away Believe It Or Not Gentlemen, Start Your Engines Built To Last I Will Take You Home Victim or The Crime Instrumental 2 Instrumental 3
key_30.comment: 'The Inn By The Sea' tape; This tape was left in a room occupied by The Grateful Dead at "The Inn By The Sea," in Cape Elizabeth, Maine when they were doing the July 2 and 3, 1988 shows at Oxford Plains, Maine; Recorded at Club Front?

key_62.set2: Victim Or The Crime-> Foolish Heart-> Playin' In The Band-> China Doll-> Playin' In The Band-> Drums-> Space-> The Wheel-> Black Peter-> Around & Around-> Good Lovin', E: The Mighty Quinn

key_63.name: Grateful Dead
key_63.set1: Jack Straw, Althea, Mama Tried-> Big River, Peggy-O, When I Paint My Masterpiece, Louie Louie, The Music Never Stopped
key_63.set2: Bertha-> Cumberland Blues, Looks Like Rain, Terrapin Station-> Drums-> Space-> Truckin'-> Goin' Down The Road Feelin' Bad-> Morning Dew, E: Johnny B. Goode

key_64.name: Grateful Dead
key_64.set1: Shakedown Street, Minglewood Blues, Candyman, Beat It On Down The Line-> Greatest Story Ever Told, To Lay Me Down, Cassidy-> Deal
key_64.set2: China Cat Sunflower-> I Know You Rider, Just Like Tom Thumb's Blues, Estimated Prophet-> Eyes Of The World-> Drums-> Space-> I Need A Miracle-> Dear Mr. Fantasy-> Hey Jude-> Turn On Your Lovelight E: Brokedown Palace

key_65.name: Grateful Dead
key_65.set1: Let The Good Times Roll, Hell In A Bucket, Cold Rain & Snow, Walkin' Blues, Loser, Memphis Blues, Dupree's Diamond Blues, Promised Land
key_65.set2: Samson & Delilah, Ship of Fools, Victim Or The Crime-> Foolish Heart-> Drums-> Space-> I Will Take You Home-> The Other One-> Stella Blue-> Sugar Magnolia, E: U.S. Blues

key_66.name: Grateful Dead
key_66.set1: Iko Iko, Feel Like A Stranger, West L.A. Fadeaway, Little Red Rooster, Box Of Rain, Ramble On Rose, When I Paint My Masterpiece, Don't Ease Me In
key_66.set2: Chinese Bones, Neighborhood Girls, Crazy Fingers, Women Are Smarter, Every Time You Go Away, What's Going On-> Drums-> Space-> The Wheel-> Throwing Stones-> Not Fade Away, E: Good Lovin', Knockin' On Heaven's Door
key_66.comment: Show was a Rain Forrest Benefit, Other Artist(s): Mick Taylor on West LA and Rooster, Suzanne Vega on Chinese Bones, Neighborhood Girls and Heavan's Door, Daryl Hall and John Oats on Every Time and What's Going On, Baba Olatunji & Michael Hinton on Drums, Hornsby on NFA, Jack Cassady on both encores, Bruce Hornsby and the Range openned.

key_67.name: Grateful Dead
key_67.set1: Iko Iko, Walkin' Blues, Stagger Lee, Me & My Uncle-> Big River, When Push Comes To Shove, Let It Grow
key_67.set2: Bertha, Playin' In The Band-> Terrapin Station-> Drums-> Space-> The Wheel-> All Along The Watchtower-> Black Peter-> Sugar Magnolia, E: U.S. Blues

key_68.name: Grateful Dead
key_68.set1: Hell In A Bucket, Sugaree, Little Red Rooster, Friend Of The Devil, Queen Jane Approximately, Tennessee Jed, Cassidy, Don't Ease Me In
key_68.set2: Victim Or The Crime-> Scarlet Begonias-> Fire On The Mountain-> Drums-> Space-> The Other One-> I Need A Miracle-> Uncle John's Band-> Morning Dew, E: One More Saturday Night

key_69.name: Grateful Dead
key_69.set1: Cold Rain & Snow, Minglewood Blues, Peggy-O, Memphis Blues, To Lay Me Down, Box Of Rain, Deal
key_69.set2: Crazy Fingers-> Samson & Delilah, Space-> Estimated Prophet-> Eyes Of The World-> Drums-> Space-> Gimme Some Lovin', Gimme Some Lovin'-> Stella Blue-> Throwing Stones-> Not Fade Away, E: Black Muddy River

key_70.name: Grateful Dead
key_70.set1: Touch Of Grey, Minglewood Blues, Row Jimmy, It's All Over Now, Brown Eyed Women, When I Paint My Masterpiece, Bird Song, Promised Land
key_70.set2: China Cat Sunflower > I Know You Rider, Saint Of Circstance > He's Gone > Drums > Space > Goin' Down The Road Feeling Bad > I Need A Miracle > Dear Mr. Fantasy > Hey Jude, E: Black Muddy River

key_71.name: Grateful Dead
key_71.set1: The Music Never Stopped-> Sugaree, Blow Away, Walkin' Blues, When Push Comes To Shove, Queen Jane Approximately, Tennessee Jed, Let It Grow
key_71.set2: One More Saturday Night, Crazy Fingers-> Playing In The Band-> Uncle John's Band-> Drums-> Space-> Truckin'-> Smokestack Lightnin'-> Stella Blue-> Turn On Your Lovelight, E: U.S. Blues

key_72.name: Grateful Dead
key_72.set1: Mississippi Half-Step Uptown Toodleloo ; Never Trust A Woman ; Feel Like A Stranger ; Friend Of The Devil ; Stuck In Mobile With The Memphis Blues Again ; To Lay Me Down ; Don't Ease Me In
key_72.set2: Box Of Rain ; Victim Or The Crime ; Foolish Heart ; Looks Like Rain ; Terrapin Station ; Drums ; The Wheel ; Gimme Some Lovin' ; All Along The Watchtower ; Morning Dew

key_73.name: Grateful Dead
key_73.set1: Hell In A Bucket, They Love Each Other, Little Red Rooster, Loser, Beat It On Down The Line-> Greatest Story Ever Told, Peggy-O, When I Paint My Masterpiece, Bird Song
key_73.set2: Scarlet Begonias-> Fire On The Mountain, Estimated Prophet-> Eyes Of The World-> Drums*-> Space-> I Will Take You Home-> The Other One-> Wharf Rat-> Throwing Stones-> Not Fade Away, E: Iko Iko**, Knockin' On Heaven's Door**
key_73.comment: Other Artist(s): *w/ members of Neville Brothers, ** w/ the Bangles

key_74.name: Grateful Dead

key_74.set2: China Cat Sunflower-> I Know You Rider, Playin' In The Band-> Built To Last-> Drums-> Space-> I Need A Miracle-> Dear Mr. Fantasy-> Hey Jude-> Turn On Your Love Light, E: Black Muddy River

key_75.comment: Happy B-Day sung before Wang Dang (Brent's 36th)

key_81.name: Grateful Dead
key_81.set1: Let The Good Times Roll-> Franklin's Tower, Wang Dang Doodle*, West L.A. Fadeaway*, When I Paint My Masterpiece, Cold Rain & Snow, Cassidy-> Don't Ease Me In
key_81.set2: Sugar Magnolia*-> Touch Of Gray*-> Women Are Smarter*-> Terrapin Station-> Drums**-> Space-> The Wheel-> Gimme Some Lovin -> Watchtower-> Morning Dew-> Sugar mag Reprise-> Sunshine Daydream, Wharf Rat, Goin Down the Road, Saturday Night
key_81.comment: Other Artist(s): * w/ Clarence Clemons on sax, ** Baba Olatunji, Sikiru Adepoju and Kitaro

key_82.name: Grateful Dead
key_82.set1: Instrumental Victim Or the Crime Blow Away Believe It or Not Gentleman, Start Your Engines Built To Last I Will Take You Home Victim Or the Crime Instrumental 2 Instrumental 3 filler: Bob Weir studio sessions Shit Happens (Barlow vocal?) Jam Jam Betty Cantor Vault tape Barbed Wire Whipping Party
key_82.comment: The Inn By The Sea tape; found in hotel "The Inn By The Sea" Cape Elizabeth, ME occupied by The Grateful Dead during their 7/2-3/88 Oxford Plains, ME shows; sbd
